lead_paragraph: Rain delayed the 91st running of the Indianapolis 500 for more than three hours on Sunday, with Tony Kanaan taking the lead just before the race was red-flagged after 113 of 200 laps.
snippet: Rain delayed the 91st running of the Indianapolis 500 for more than three hours on Sunday, with Tony Kanaan taking the lead just before the race was red-flagged after 113 of 200 laps.
